titles.title: Authorizing the Clerk to inform the President of the election of the Speaker and the Clerk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Instructs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to inform the President that Newt Gingrich has been elected Speaker of the House and that Robin H. Carle has been elected Clerk.
